thread.title: Comfortable, Quiet and Ideally Located
thread.title_full: Comfortable, Quiet and Ideally Located - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: j-and-i-inGermany
title: Comfortable, Quiet and Ideally Located
text: The location is ideal for anyone who does not want to be in the midst of large-scale tourism: there are many great restaurants within walking distance and probably 100 good restaurants within walking distance. Access to the metro is easy and services are abundant. The hotel itself is well-run and staff are friendly and efficient.
